snippet.title: Secrets In Green | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Borealis is BACK with a new visual novel!  Set in early 1900s England, Secrets In Green is a historical slice of life/horror visual novel with an intriguing mystery.

Alma, a young lady with a history of poor mental health, is sent to a cottage in the countryside for some peace and quiet.  However, that's the LAST thing she's about to get.  When a mysterious plant in the garden seems to begin sending Alma unnerving messages, she must uncover the truth and solve a very real mystery, before it's too late.  But in a society run by ignorant men who dismiss women at every turn, can she succeed?

Secrets In Green is available on Itch, with a Steam release coming soon!

⭐ Get the game: https://borealisgames.itch.io/secrets-in-green
